specialAbilities.name: Single Launch
specialAbilities.description:
If this aircraft takes any damage, take 1 damage only, then immediately return this arcraft to the 
carrier that launched it.

specialAbilities.name: Survivable
specialAbilities.description: If attacked by weapons of POW 0, gain +4 EVA.

specialAbilities.name: Single Launch

If this aircraft takes any damage, take 1 damage only, then immediately return this arcraft to the 
airbase that launched it.
